scripts.accounts: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat accounts
scripts.clean: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat clean
scripts.check: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat check
scripts.compile: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat compile
scripts.test: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat test
scripts.coverage: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat coverage
